import numpy as np from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("particle_attributes.particles.DtMeasure") z = stat_parser("particle_attributes.stat")
for i in range(10): name = 'DtMeasure_' + str(1) dt_errors[i] = s[name]['DtVal'][i] - z['dt']['value'][i] dt_error=abs(dt_errors).max() print ("max error",dt_error)
